message.name: PLANCK_STATEINFO
message.field: System ID
Component ID
Timestamp (micros since boot or Unix epoch)
Current flight mode
Flight status: bit0:armed, bit1:in_flight, bit2:failsafe
Roll angle (rad, -pi..+pi)
Pitch angle (rad, -pi..+pi)
Yaw angle (rad, -pi..+pi)
X acceleration (raw)
Y acceleration (raw)
Z acceleration (raw)
Latitude
Longitude
Altitude, expressed as * 1000 (millimeters), AMSL (not WGS84 - note that virtually all GPS modules provide the AMSL as well)
Altitude above ground in meters, expressed as * 1000 (millimeters)
GPS velocity in m/s in NORTH direction in earth-fixed NED frame
GPS velocity in m/s in EAST direction in earth-fixed NED frame
GPS velocity in m/s in DOWN direction in earth-fixed NED frame

message.name: VERSION_QUERY_RESPONSE
message.description: Used for obtaining software version numbers. Request and response are the same message
message.field: System ID
Component ID
Query or response (QUERY=0, RESPONSE=NON-ZERO)
Entity to query/respond (planck-ctrl=0)
NULL-terminated string response with version or N/A for query (max 40 chars including NULL-term)

message.name: PLANCK_STATUS
message.description: The state of the planck's control software
message.field: System ID
Component ID
Controller status bitfield (TAG_ESTIMATOR_OK=bit0, BOAT_ESTIMATOR_OK=bit1)
Failsafe status bitfield (COMMBOX_OK=bit0, COMMBOX_GPS_OK)
Ready for takeoff
Ready for landing
Takeoff has completed (reached target altitude)

message.name: PLANCK_LANDING_TAG_STATE_NED
message.description: State information of the tag relative to the aircraft
message.field: Age of the latest measurement in milliseconds
X position of the tag relative to the CG of the aircraft in the NED frame
Y position of the tag relative to the CG of the aircraft in the NED frame
Z position of the tag relative to the CG of the aircraft in the NED frame
X velocity of the tag relative to the CG of the aircraft in the NED frame
Y velocity of the tag relative to the CG of the aircraft in the NED frame
Z velocity of the tag relative to the CG of the aircraft in the NED frame
Euler angle roll of the tag in NED frame
Euler angle pitch of the tag in NED frame
Euler angle yaw of the tag in NED frame

message.name: PLANCK_LANDING_TAG_STATE_BODY
message.description: State information of the tag relative to the body frame
message.field: Age of the latest measurement in milliseconds
X position of the tag relative to the CG of the aircraft in the body frame
Y position of the tag relative to the CG of the aircraft in the body frame
Z position of the tag relative to the CG of the aircraft in the body frame
X velocity of the tag relative to the CG of the aircraft in the body frame
Y velocity of the tag relative to the CG of the aircraft in the body frame
Z velocity of the tag relative to the CG of the aircraft in the body frame
Euler angle roll of the tag in body frame
Euler angle pitch of the tag in body frame
Euler angle yaw of the tag in body frame
